section.title: Purpose of this document
section.para: This document summarizes the design steps for the development of the BioPreDyn integrated software suite (deliverables 3.4, 7.2 and 8.3 of the BioPreDyn project). It first quickly reminds the main requirements for the BioPreDyn software framework; architecture and components of the BioPreDyn engine back-end are then described; finally, structure and classes of the graphical user interface are presented, along with details on how it interfaces with the back-end.
This document does not give information on how to install nor use the BioPreDyn software framework; this is covered by the prototype user guide.

section.title: Audience
section.para: This document is primarily intended to developers willing to understand the choices made during the BioPreDyn software suite design stage. It is particularly useful for maintenance and modification purposes.

section.title: Organization
section.para: This guide is divided into four main sections:

formalpara.title: Introduction
formalpara.para: A short introduction to the project context, and how the current document fits in the global picture.

formalpara.title: Requirements
formalpara.para: Quick review of the requirements for the BioPreDyn software framework, both for the engine and the graphical user interface.

formalpara.title: Architecture
formalpara.para: Detailed description of each component of the BioPreDyn software framework, and of its graphical user interface.

formalpara.title: Implementation
formalpara.para: This section gives an overview of the technologies chosen for implementing the BioPreDyn software framework.

formalpara.title: References
formalpara.para: Articles and publications related to the project.
